application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 15(A) (ground gas and vapour investigation(GVI)) of planning permission PP/22/02525 (Construction of single-storey basement under footprint of both properties (97-101 and 103 Wilsham Street) and less than 50% of front and rear gardens with pavement lights; lowered ground floor level including lowered external thresholds; additional fenestration including three skylights at roof level and dormer window on rear elevation of St James Hall; associated external alterations including additional permeable landscaping and street front furniture refurbishment; provision of plant extract located within rear garden and at roof level)
